<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set ReportError up-front so that it can be used if construction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// process fails.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Server-&gt;ReportError)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Attempt to create transport.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#42;Server, std::forward&lt;TransportTCtorArgTs&gt;(TransportTCtorArgs)...);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Server-&gt;T = std::move(&#42;T);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Err = Server-&gt;T-&gt;start())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::move(Err);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
